  • Method Details

    • execute

      public CourseEntity execute(CreateCourseRequest createCourseRequest, long idUser)
      Create the course

      The method performs in the following steps:

      1. Find the user by idUser
      2. Valid the user permission
      3. Create the course entity
      4. Verify if the course is unique
      5. Save the **course** in Database
      Parameters:
      createCourseRequest - Request containg the data for create a new course
      idUser - The id of User who wants to create a course
      Returns:
      The created and persisted CourseEntity, including its generated ID.
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundDomainException - If the user is not found
      UserWithoutCreateCoursePermissionException - If the user don't have permission to create the course
      CourseNotUniqueException - If the database alrealdy have a course with the same name or acronym
